context: Coinbase Global, Inc. is a cryptocurrency exchange and platform focused on crypto trading, custody, staking, and blockchain infrastructure. Crypto infrastructure leader. International expansion and derivatives.

competitors.name: Binance
competitors.notes: Largest global exchange by volume, rebuilding after regulatory settlements

competitors.name: Kraken
competitors.notes: Major US competitor with derivatives and institutional services

competitors.name: Robinhood
competitors.notes: Retail platform with significant crypto trading volume

competitors.name: OKX
competitors.notes: Global exchange with strong derivatives and DeFi integration

competitors.name: Crypto.com
competitors.notes: Global exchange with cards, DeFi, and sports sponsorships

competitors.name: BlackRock/Fidelity ETFs
competitors.notes: Traditional finance capturing crypto exposure through ETFs

competitors.name: Bitwise
competitors.notes: Crypto asset manager with ETF products

competitors.name: Anchorage Digital
competitors.notes: Institutional crypto bank and custody competitor
